chain-definition.name: BBAW: Part-Of-Speech (German)
chain-definition.description: Lemmatisation and part-of-speech tagging with STTS

chain-definition.name: SfS: Named Entity & Geo Location
chain-definition.description: Two services: the first one will identify NEs, the second one geo locations, although it seems Ralda does not yet import the result of the latter.
